scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start --prefix backend" "npm run start --prefix client"
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server --prefix backend" "npm run build --prefix client"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.server:test: cd backend && npm i jest && npm run test
